Question: Sumitomo Rubber Industries, Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Sumitomo Rubber Industries, Ltd.

Product: Smart all-season tires with Active Tread technology

- Active Tread technology adjusts tire softness based on weather conditions for improved performance
- SENSING CORE technology transforms tires into sensors, gathering real-time data on road conditions and vehicle control
- Intended for electric vehicles and other applications, ensuring safe driving in various weather conditions
- Aims to reduce the need for tire replacements, contributing to a more sustainable society
- Launch planned for late 2024

CES 2024 Presentation:

- Booth showcasing SENSING CORE and advanced initiatives using proprietary sensor-less sensing technology
- Presentations by Satoru Yamamoto, President and CEO, and Darren Thomas, President and CEO of Sumitomo Rubber North America, Inc.
- Vision utilizing SENSING CORE for future integration of data with cloud services

Collaboration:

- Sumitomo Rubber, Sumitomo Riko, and Sumitomo Electric collaborating with LanzaTech to develop waste recycling solutions
- Joint development agreement to transform waste materials into valuable resources
- Focus on circular economy and recycling technologies

Reference: Official website of CES 2024: https://www.ces.tech/
